Huge pub, and with all the different floors easy to even get lost in. Very cool-looking place, but unfortunately on a busy night tends to be way too full and the music is extremely loud. Kind of takes away all the fun. Should probably try when it's a bit quieter and you can actually move around to explore all the hidden corners.

Cool Irish pub, worth checking it out for its unique interior. Atmosphere is lively. I would prefer a pint where the head doesn't disappear after a few seconds though, because Irish pints keep a good head. I'll give 5 stars if the pint was better. I tried the Heineken.
